targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.95, {job="nginx"} | json | wms_request="GetMap" | unwrap request_time [1m]) by (wms_layers)
quantile_over_time(0.99, {job="nginx"} | json | wms_request="GetMap" | unwrap request_time [1m]) by (wms_layers)
sum(count_over_time({job="nginx"} | json | request_type="tile" | cache_status="HIT" [$__range])) / sum(count_over_time({job="nginx"} | json | request_type="tile" | cache_status != "" [$__range]))
avg_over_time({job="nginx"} | json | request_type="tile" | cache_status="HIT" | unwrap request_time [1m])
avg_over_time({job="nginx"} | json | request_type="tile" | cache_status="MISS" | unwrap request_time [1m])

panels.title: Tile Response Time: HIT vs MISS
Avg Response Time by Render Style
P95/P99 Response Time by Render Style

targets.expr: avg_over_time({job="nginx"} | json | wms_layers=~"t2m.*" | unwrap request_time [1m]) by (wms_layers)
avg_over_time({job="nginx"} | json | wms_layers=~"mslp.*" | unwrap request_time [1m]) by (wms_layers)

panels.title: Response Time by Layer Variant (t2m, mslp)

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.99, {job="nginx"} | json | wms_request = "GetMap" | unwrap request_time [1m]) by (wms_layers)
quantile_over_time(0.50, {job="nginx"} | json | wms_request = "GetMap" | unwrap request_time [1m]) by (wms_layers)

panels.title: Response Time Percentiles (p50, p99) by Layer

targets.expr: avg_over_time({container="joemapserver-mapserver-1"} |~ "msDrawMap\\(\\) total time" | regexp "total time: (?P<time>[\\d.]+)s" | unwrap time [1m])
max_over_time({container="joemapserver-mapserver-1"} |~ "msDrawMap\\(\\) total time" | regexp "total time: (?P<time>[\\d.]+)s" | unwrap time [1m])
